abstract: The idea for this article was born on the discussions of the discipline policy Production of law taught by Professor Osvaldo Ferreira de Melo Program Graduate Studies Sensu - Ph.D. - University of Vale do Itaja-UNIVALI. This is to (re) avail the limits, scope and epistemological concepts of law in post-modernity to corroborate reasonable criteria in the development of legal rules. One wonders whether the conception of this category from the Modern Age provides meanings that are (re) build the State, Society and People in the beginning of the XXI Century.
title: Poltica do Direito e a produo da norma jurdica na ps-modernidade: reflexes epistemolgicas
subject: law
